Package net.jeqo.blockmaster.blocks.custom

Class CustomBlock

java.lang.Object
net.jeqo.blockmaster.blocks.custom.CustomBlock
Direct Known Subclasses:
DirectionalCustomBlock
public class CustomBlock extends Object
The class that represents a custom block within BlockMaster

    • CustomBlock

      public CustomBlock(String key, String id, int customModelData, org.bukkit.Instrument instrument, int note, boolean powered, org.bukkit.Material material)
      The constructor used to create a custom block
      Parameters:
      key - The configuration key for the block configuration, type java.lang.String
      id - The ID of the block, type java.lang.String
      customModelData - The custom model data of the block item, type int
      instrument - The instrument of the block, type org.bukkit.Instrument
      note - The note value that the noteblock is set to, type int
      powered - The powered state of the noteblock, type boolean
      material - The material of the block item, type org.bukkit.Material
